channel.title: Comments on: Spacemacs: Emacs + Vim
channel.description: On programming and text editing. Addicted to lisps.

item.title: By: valrus
item.dc:creator: valrus
item.description:
100% agree about Spacemacs, it's really great and the first "starter kit" that actually allowed me as a Vim user to get into Emacs. The use of layers is a great design, the default bindings are well thought out, just a really solid piece of work.
Note I think that in your first sentence you should s/pneumonic/mnemonic/. That threw me for a loop when I came across your post.
item.content:encoded:
100% agree about Spacemacs, it’s really great and the first “starter kit” that actually allowed me as a Vim user to get into Emacs. The use of layers is a great design, the default bindings are well thought out, just a really solid piece of work.

Note I think that in your first sentence you should s/pneumonic/mnemonic/. That threw me for a loop when I came across your post.
